4308370.name: Operation Candy Land Demo
4308370.description:
Welcome to Operation Candy Land Demo. This demo is here to test one thing: is the core game fun, clear, and worth expanding into a full release? We’re planning a bigger game with more characters, turrets, upgrades, and build variety, but your feedback will help us prioritize what matters most. If you enjoy the demo, wishlisting the full game on Steam or PlayStation. It really helps support development.
And if you have any feedback, we’re always happy to hear it!

It may look cute, but this game is tough. Candy monsters attack from every side, and they never stop. Run, shoot, and build towers at the same time to survive. Each run is different, with new enemies, upgrades, and massive candy bosses. Lose, level up, and jump back in stronger this colorful world hides a serious challenge.

Keep moving, blast candy monsters, and build towers to stay alive as chaos grows. Candy attacks come from every direction, and the waves never stop. Use powerful weapons like shotguns, miniguns, and RPGs to take down gummy bears, lollipops, and massive candy bosses. Every run is different, with new enemies, upgrades, and challenges to test your reflexes and strategy. Lose a run, level up your skills, and jump back in stronger. In this colorful, chaotic world, surviving takes quick thinking, fast moves, and clever tower-building.

Cute candy monsters are out for revenge! Gummy bears, lollipops, and marshmallows attack endlessly from every direction, and the chaos never stops. Run through colorful worlds, blast enemies with powerful weapons like shotguns, miniguns, and RPGs, and build towers to defend yourself. Each run is different, with new enemies, upgrades, and huge candy bosses that push your skills to the limit. Lose a run, level up, and come back stronger. In this sweet but deadly world, survival takes fast thinking, clever building, and lightning fast reflexes.
